title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, May 15, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss describes to his wife the results and outcome of fighting near Spotsylvania. He mentions a number of deaths, and speculates on the state of the Union army, including its morale.
keywords: Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Military Authority, Women, Family, Patriotism, Desertion/Leave, American Civil War
